attributes.action: Notice of No Confidence in CON/DUP Government to Trigger a UK General Election
attributes.additional_details:
Since the General Election in 2017, the Coalition Government has and continues to fail the United Kingdom and its Citizens.
Theresa May has failed to make good on the Campaign promises made, including her inability to negotiate and deliver a suitable Brexit Deal. She has now resigned as a result of her incompetency.
Boris Johnson has been summoned to stand trial in court for EU Referendum Misconduct while in Office, including his erroneous claim of EU membership fees being £350,000,000 per week.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned members of the Great British Public, do hereby declare our irrevocable and complete lack of confidence in the current Conservative-Democratic Union Party Coalition Government. We demand the Parties relinquish their Cabinet Positions and a General Election be called without delay.
